Class Currencies

java.lang.Object
Currencies
public class Currencies
extends java.lang.Object
A map of every Currency and a number representing how much of each.
Author:
Wil Simpson

  • Field Summary

    Fields 
    Modifier and Type Field Description
    private java.util.TreeMap<Currency,​java.lang.Integer> currencies
    Sorted map of every currency and the amount of each sorted from biggest currency to smallest currency

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors 
    Constructor Description
    Currencies​(Currencies... currenciesArray)
    Creates an new currencies given any number of other currencies.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    void decrementCurrency​(Currency c)
    Decrements the current amount of currency by one if the current amount is greater than 0.
    int getAmount​(Currency currency)
    Gets the amount of a given currency
    Currency getBiggestCurrency​(float value)
    Gets the biggest value currency with an amount of greater than zero.
    float getValue()
    Gets the value of all of the currencies added together
    void incrementCurrency​(Currency c)
    Increments the current amount of currency by one
    void print()
    Prints all currencies and their amount to a new line in the console
    Currencies randomize​(int minimum, int maximum)
    Randomizes the amount of each currency inclusively between the given minimum and maximum
    Currencies reset()
    Sets all the currencies to 0 and returns a reference to itself
    void setCurrency​(Currency c, int amount)
    Sets the given currency to the given amount
    java.lang.String toString()
    Human readable string of all the currencies and the amount for each

    Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

    clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, wait, wait, wait

  • Field Details

    • currencies

      private final java.util.TreeMap<Currency,​java.lang.Integer> currencies
      Sorted map of every currency and the amount of each sorted from biggest currency to smallest currency

  • Constructor Details

    • Currencies

      public Currencies​(Currencies... currenciesArray)
      Creates an new currencies given any number of other currencies. If none are given then the amount will be initialized to 0
      Parameters:
      currenciesArray - currencies to combine

  • Method Details

    • getAmount

      public int getAmount​(Currency currency)
      Gets the amount of a given currency
      Parameters:
      currency - currency to give amount of
      Returns:
      amount of given currency

    • decrementCurrency

      public void decrementCurrency​(Currency c) throws TransactionException
      Decrements the current amount of currency by one if the current amount is greater than 0.
      Parameters:
      c - currency to decrement
      Throws:
      TransactionException - throws an insufficient change exception if the decrement will cause the amount to be less than 0

    • incrementCurrency

      public void incrementCurrency​(Currency c)
      Increments the current amount of currency by one
      Parameters:
      c - currency to increment

    • setCurrency

      public void setCurrency​(Currency c, int amount)
      Sets the given currency to the given amount
      Parameters:
      c - currency to set amount of
      amount - amount to set to

    • getValue

      public float getValue()
      Gets the value of all of the currencies added together
      Returns:
      value of all currencies

    • getBiggestCurrency

      public Currency getBiggestCurrency​(float value)
      Gets the biggest value currency with an amount of greater than zero. If there isn't one then null will be returned
      Parameters:
      value - value of change needed
      Returns:
      biggest possible currency that is less than the given value

    • reset

      public Currencies reset()
      Sets all the currencies to 0 and returns a reference to itself
      Returns:
      itself

    • randomize

      public Currencies randomize​(int minimum, int maximum)
      Randomizes the amount of each currency inclusively between the given minimum and maximum
      Parameters:
      minimum - minimum amount to set to
      maximum - maximum amount to set to
      Returns:
      itself

    • print

      public void print()
      Prints all currencies and their amount to a new line in the console

    • toString

      public java.lang.String toString()
      Human readable string of all the currencies and the amount for each
      Overrides:
      toString in class java.lang.Object
      Returns:
      string containing all currencies and the amount of each
